name: truth or dare 2
description:
100s new truths & dares FREE!!!

Ever wanted to know the real TRUTH about your friends? Or to DARE them to do something crazy?

This BRAND NEW GAME has LOADS of great ideas for truths and dares! Shake up your friends with these extreme questions, and things won't ever be the same again...

Some examples:

- "Who is the best looking player?"
- "Toilet paper: scrunch or fold?"
- "Copy the last message you sent your bf/gf, and send it to your parents"
